duties_responsibilities.duty: Raise, position, align, and connect columns, beams, and other structural members to complete structural framing.
Read erection and shop drawings, and fabricate structural members in the field.
Install stairs, guardrails, grab rails, and plumbing of structural steel.
Use gridlines and benchmarks to complete layout, operate powered hand tools, forklifts, and aerial working platforms.
Maintain 100% safety and enforce required PPE for all team members.
Pass internal random safety audits and have the knowledge to perform the job.
Have experience with modern tools and equipment, and be able to work efficiently and accurately in a fast-paced environment.
Comfortable working at heights, signaling cranes, connecting steel, and operating powered hand tools, forklifts, and aerial working platforms.
